title: Texas THC Tale Update
scriptBeat: Narrator: "October 2025. Texas became the 40th state for medical cannabis..."
Jesse: "They FINALLY did it! But wait - there's more drama..."
Liv Hana: "Governor Abbott issued Executive Order GA-56. Emergency rules. Age verification NOW mandatory."
Montage: ID checks, QR code scans, lab testing, store compliance
Jesse: "From prohibition to $5 billion industry... This is the Texas THC Tale. Stay TOONED!"
cta: Subscribe for the REAL story behind Texas cannabis!
easterEgg: References May and Oct 2025 major Texas cannabis policy shifts
